paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient P1 was diagnosed with cardiomyopathy at age 42.
Patient P2 presented with neuropathy symptoms at age 48.
Patient P3 is a carrier but remains asymptomatic.
Patient P4 showed mixed symptoms of amyloidosis at age 55.

functional_data.summary: The V30M variant was shown to destabilize the TTR tetramer, leading to increased aggregation.

variants.segregation_data: The V30M variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the importance of TTR variants in amyloid fibril formation.
key_quotes: Many TTR mutations interfere with tetramer stability, increasing the amyloidogenic potential of the protein.
In 24 h, TTR L55P forms aggregates in the medium.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of TTR variants and their clinical significance

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and tables.
